abstract.t: Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) is a widely deployed application protocol for network management and data retrieval. In this document we describe the applicability of SNMP for 6LoWPANs. We discuss the implementation considerations of SNMP Agent and SNMP Manager followed by the deployment considerations of the SNMP protocol. Our discussion also covers the applicability of MIB modules for 6LoWPAN devices.
